tha-ap548:4.2: anantajinasaṃsari → anantajanasaṃsadi (bj); anantajanataṃ sudhī (sya1ed, sya2ed); anantajanataṃsarī (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap548:11.4: tayā santhuto → yo tava sāsane (sya1ed, sya2ed)
tha-ap548:12.1: homahaṃ vīra → tādisohaṃ mahāvīra (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr)
tha-ap548:21.2: nikkhamitvā agārato → nikkhanto pabbajitthaso (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap548:23.1: Isivhayaṃ gamitvāna → isivhayaṃ patanaṃ gantvā (sya1ed, sya2ed)
tha-ap548:27.2: maṃ mahāparisāya so → mamāha purisāsabho (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
